img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(19\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Five_Skandhas_%2819%29.png)
Fly using the clouds and go from the edge of the cliff, almost directly north of where you came. This will be where you can find the Son of Stones optional boss, with the Son sitting at the edge of the cliff.
img_below_text:
Beyond that, however, there's a large open area and a path that goes off to the right.
![Five Skandhas \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Five_Skandhas_%2821%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 15 from the file 'How_to_Find_the_Five_Skandhas_and_Unlock_a_Secret_Boss_.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Five Skandhas \(19\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Five_Skandhas_%2819%29.png)
Fly using the clouds and go from the edge of the cliff, almost directly north of where you came. This will be where you can find the Son of Stones optional boss, with the Son sitting at the edge of the cliff."
            - Following Text: "Beyond that, however, there's a large open area and a path that goes off to the right.
![Five Skandhas \(21\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fc/Five_Skandhas_%2821%29.png)"

img_summary: The image depicts a character in the game *Black Myth: Wukong* flying on a cloud, overlooking a grassy and rocky open area surrounded by cliffs and trees. A red arrow points toward the right, indicating a path or direction to follow. Based on the preceding and following text, this scene is part of the journey leading to the Son of Stones optional boss encounter, with the arrow guiding players toward the next area or objective.
